name: Proteck and Attack
description:
Proteck and Attack

My submission for Global Game Jam 2022, my 2nd ever games jam!

The game jam's theme was Duality.

Team:

JFlex

Brief:

A soldier lost behind enemy lines with little chance of survival.

But he finds a shield that he can use to protect himself but also defeat enemies in his path. Moving with the shield is slow but safe, without it the soldier is faster, more agile, and can roll - which way will fare him better?

Controls: (In the game but included below for completeness)

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse Button - Throw Shield/Roll

[Dev Note]

There is a respawn bug from level 2 onwards that I ran out of time before I could fix. So just don't die to see the whole game!
